item.description:
Better yet, buy my scooter an ice-cream!

On Saturday I will be leading a slow ride on back roads from Newton to Carlisle as my ODO rolls to 40K!

Speed will be variable, places to take in the scenery and places to open the thrill nozzle a bit more.

Distance? Don't worry about distance, you can ride 100 miles and never leave your neighborhood, but I hope you will and join us for this summer scoot!

We will pick up riders in 2 places on Comm Ave: At the BC Green line station and at the Hess Gas station in Newton village of Auburndale. Departures: BC 10:30AM, Hess 11AM

You can also just meet us there at Noon! It's Kimball's in Carlisle on Rt 225! Best Ice-cream eva!

We will eat for an hour and make our way back to Comm Ave by 2 so everyone can get safely home.

Hope to see you there!

Paul
item.name: Buy your scooter an ice-cream!
